resources.string: The Christmas tree tradition comes from this European Country..
This Christmas tradition is believed to have developed in early modern Germany in the 16th or possibly 15th century.
Is it true that the traditional American Christmas song \'Jingle Bells\' was actually written for Thanksgiving?
In fact, Jingle Bells was written by James Lord Pierpont for American Thanksgiving.

Most of the world\'s plastic Christmas decorations are made in this country, but only about one percent of it\'s population actually celebrate Christmas
The answer is China because only a few Chinese people are Christians.

, which is similar to French toast.
Rabanada is thick slices of day-old bread, dipped in a mixture of mild and beaten eggs, fried in butter and deliciously covered in syrup.
